info.author: Gavin M. Roy
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Application Frameworks
info.description:
Troika
======
Troika is a prototype Python 3.5 asyncio web framework
that aims to be a lightweight, fast Tornado replacement.

The goal is to make API compatible Applications and
RequestHandlers that make porting from Tornado to Troika
easy.

This is a very early WIP.

Development
-----------
